languages.text: "Почему он узнал мое лицо, ведьма? Надо думать — потому, что часто видел его в кошмарах. Надеюсь, и к тебе они приходят".
"Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."
languages.original_text: "Почему он узнал мое лицо, ведьма? Надо думать — потому, что часто видел его в кошмарах. Надеюсь, и к тебе они приходят".

traits.locale_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “他为什么会认出我的脸，女巫？我猜是因为他经常在噩梦中看到这张脸，我也希望你会在噩梦中看到它。”
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: “他为什么会认出我的脸，女巫？我猜是因为他经常在噩梦中看到这张脸，我也希望你会在噩梦中看到它。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Pourquoi il a reconnu mon visage, sorcière ? Probablement parce qu'il m'a souvent vue dans ses pires cauchemars. J'espère qu'il en est de même pour vous. »
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi il a reconnu mon visage, sorcière ? Probablement parce qu'il m'a souvent vue dans ses pires cauchemars. J'espère qu'il en est de même pour vous. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¿Que por qué reconocía mi cara, bruja? Supongo que porque la veía a menudo en sus pesadillas. Espero que tú también la veas en las tuyas».
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: «¿Que por qué reconocía mi cara, bruja? Supongo que porque la veía a menudo en sus pesadillas. Espero que tú también la veas en las tuyas».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「なぜ奴が私の顔を知っていたのかだと、魔女よ？悪夢でもしょっちゅう見ていたからと考えるのが妥当だ。あなたも悪夢を見ればいい」
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ奴が私の顔を知っていたのかだと、魔女よ？悪夢でもしょっちゅう見ていたからと考えるのが妥当だ。あなたも悪夢を見ればいい」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Warum hat er mein Gesicht erkannt, Hexe? Doch wohl, weil er es oft in seinen Albträumen gesehen hat. Ich hoffe, Ihr seht es auch."
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: "Warum hat er mein Gesicht erkannt, Hexe? Doch wohl, weil er es oft in seinen Albträumen gesehen hat. Ich hoffe, Ihr seht es auch."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

languages.text: "Yüzümü nereden tanıdığını mı soruyorsun cadı? Sık sık beni gördüğü kâbuslarından olabilir. Senin de görmeni umarım."
languages.original_text: "Why did he recognise my face, witch? I should think because he has seen it often in his nightmares. I hope you see it too."

traits.locale_text: "Yüzümü nereden tanıdığını mı soruyorsun cadı? Sık sık beni gördüğü kâbuslarından olabilir. Senin de görmeni umarım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
